meaningMnemonic: In this <radical>construction</radical> project, they will be using <radical>thread</radical> to hold everything together. The color of the thread is a <kanji>deep red</kanji>, and it gives everything a <kanji>crimson</kanji> look.
readingMnemonic: You're done, and the whole building is a <kanji>deep red</kanji> <kanji>crimson</kanji> color (it takes a lot of thread to hold a whole building in place). It's time to show the client, Emperor <reading>こう</reading>いち, the finished product.
